page.title: 05FASHION SHOPS IN HUNTLY
page.content: There are several fashion shops in Huntly, providing a wide varity of garments to suit all ages and tastes.The price range is wide. Examples are Denim Plus,Flair,Boyds, ,Dress Sense and Reid and Gordons. Boyds Dress Sense and Reid and Gordons provides fashion from babies through to Senior citizens while Denim Plus cater more for a wide choice too. Flair is run along the lines of a boutique, while Boyds is a general drapery and fashion shop. All shops buy their stock from the south or from abroad. Many of the most expensive clothes are foreign. Customers are drawn from around Huntly. Most of the shops stock accessories of some sort eg handbags gloves fashion jewellery. To complete an outfit.Huntly has several shoe shops.
